title: suggest to make download better
body: > I suggest downloading a version of the game that is compressed and available on BitTorrent and download servers

replies.body: That could be a decent idea, but be careful when doing so as those downloads are not regulated by us whatsoever. There's always a chance that you could be download something malicious like a virus when getting torrents, so if you choose to do so, just make sure you've got some virus software handy!
